Goldman Sachs is one of the worldâ€™s biggest financial groups, which provides a variety of financial services, such as investment management, banking, securities, etc.
Microsoft Corporation is an American multinational technology company with headquarters in Redmond, Washington. It develops electronics, personal computers, and related services.
Amazon.com, Inc., is an American multinational technology company based in Seattle, Washington that focuses in e-commerce, cloud computing, and artificial intelligence.
JPMorgan Chase and Co. is a leading global financial services firm and one of the largest banking institutions in the United States, with operations worldwide.
Samsung Group is a South Korean multinational conglomerate headquartered in Samsung Town, Seoul. It comprises numerous affiliated businesses, most of them united under the Samsung brand.
